dcterms:creator: L. Lugini
D. Litman
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 73 transcripts of text-based classroom discussions, annotated for argument components and specificity, focusing on claims, evidence, and warrants.
dcterms:title: Classroom Discussions Dataset

dcterms:creator: C. Stab
I. Gurevych
dcterms:description: Feature set from an existing argument mining system developed for student essays, used to classify argument components in classroom discussions.
dcterms:title: wLDA Features

dcterms:creator: R. Swanson
B. Ecker
M. Walker
dcterms:description: Feature set derived from a model for extracting argumentative portions of text from online dialogues, applied to improve argument component classification.
dcterms:title: Online Dialogue Features

dcterms:creator: S. Toulmin
dcterms:description: A model for argumentation that provides a framework for understanding the structure of arguments, including claims, evidence, and warrants.
dcterms:title: Argument Component Labels

dcterms:creator: L. Lugini
D. Litman
dcterms:description: An annotation scheme for predicting specificity in classroom discussions, used to enhance argument component classification.
dcterms:title: Specificity Annotation Scheme
